newsitem.title: USA: PIA no longer represents Buena Vista.
newsitem.headline: PIA no longer represents Buena Vista.

text.p: PIA Merchandising Services Inc said Thursday that Buena Vista Home Video has advised PIA that it will no longer represent Buena Vista Home Video at Wal-Mart after June 15.

Buena Vista Home Video is obligated on or about that date to begin utilizing the services of one of the two merchandising firms to which Wal-Mart has granted the exclusive right to merchandise the video category in its stores, PIA said.
While the company said it is disappointed by the loss of the Wal-Mart segment of the Buena Vista business, this loss will be substantially offset by gains in other areas over the balance of the year.

For the three months ended March 31, the company reported net revenues increased 11.8 percent to $29.4 million, compared to $26.3 million for the same period last year. The company said it incurred a net loss of $1.2 million or $0.19 per share for the quarter, compared to net income of $0.9 million or $0.18 per share for same period a year earlier.
